class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Sneer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Where"! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p document.title: I know some lonely houses off the road
